hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

intro.title: Our Commitment to Privacy
intro.description: At HBW Technology Solutions, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our services.

company_info.specialization: Blockchain Development, DeFi Protocols, AI Trading Systems

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us and information automatically collected when you use our services:

personal.title: Personal Information
items: Name, email address, phone number
Company name and job title
Project requirements and technical specifications
Communication preferences
Billing and payment information

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Information
items: IP address and location data
Browser type, version, and operating system
Device information and screen resolution
Website usage patterns and analytics
Cookies and similar tracking technologies

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: Provide and improve our blockchain development services
Communicate with you about projects and support
Process payments and manage billing
Send important updates and security notifications
Analyze website performance and user experience
Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only in these limited circumstances:
items: With your explicit consent or at your direction
With trusted service providers who assist our operations
To comply with legal requirements or court orders
To protect our rights, property, or safety
In connection with business transfers or mergers

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your information:

technical.title: Technical Safeguards
items: End-to-end encryption for data transmission
Secure cloud storage with backup systems
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Multi-factor authentication for system access
Automated threat detection and prevention

organizational.title: Organizational Measures
items: Employee training on data protection practices
Strict access controls and need-to-know basis
Regular review and update of security policies
Incident response and breach notification procedures
Compliance with international security standards

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.description: You have several rights regarding your personal information:
items: Access: Request copies of your personal information
Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate data
Erasure: Request deletion of your personal information
Portability: Request transfer of your data to another service
Restriction: Request limitation of processing activities
Objection: Object to certain types of data processing
rights.exercise: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided in the Contact section.
